duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for sorting, and transporting hazardous and non-hazardous materials and waste, ensuring compatibility and safety processes at all times.
Assist in the segregation of chemicals by hazard class, packing compatible materials in appropriate containers, and preparing for transportation; completing necessary paperwork per job.

Determining and loading supplies needed for job completion, traveling to various industry, laboratory, and school sites to perform lab pack services, and characterizing materials at field project sites.
Assisting in ensuring proper placarding and load segregation requirements when transporting hazardous materials.
Develop good client relations by effectively communicating with Customers and directing Field Technicians/Drivers assisting with waste collection.
Introducing knowledge of high hazard materials management/assessment and cylinder handling.
Assists in characterizing materials at field project sites.

education_certification.credential: Four-year college degree (Science or environmental majors preferred) or 2+years related experience is required.
